summary: This bill, the "Regulatory Evidence-based Standards for Thorough Accountability and Reassuring Tests—Securing Updated and Necessary Statutory Evaluations Timely Act of 2025" or "RESTART SUNSET Act of 2025," amends Chapter 6 of Title 5 of the United States Code concerning the periodic review of federal agency rules. It mandates more frequent reviews, extends the review timeline, and requires agencies to publish lists of rules without significant economic impact on small entities. It also clarifies judicial review related to agency compliance with these new review requirements.
